select count(pr.process_id) from bus_process pr inner join bus_plan bs on pr.plan_id=bs.plan_id
(pr.process_status='10' or pr.process_status='20' or pr.process_status='25' or pr.process_status='30' or pr.process_status='35' or pr.process_status='40' or pr.process_status='50') and bs.plan_type=3 or (pr.process_status='15' or pr.process_status='20' or pr.process_status='25' or pr.process_status='30' or pr.process_status='35' or pr.process_status='40' or pr.process_status='50') and bs.plan_type=4
and pr.process_id = #{process_id}
and (pr.process_status = '10' or pr.process_status = '15')
and pr.process_status >= '20'
and process_status >= '10'
select pr.*, bs.plan_type from bus_process pr inner join bus_plan bs on pr.plan_id = bs.plan_id where process_id = #{process_id}
